item.title: Music for Charity
item.author: Matthew Murchie,
item.description: Raincatcher Imperial has been working tirelessly for the past months to fundraise for a water harvesting system in Tabora that will give clean, drinkable water for local schoolchildren. Coming up tomorrow (Saturday 25 February) is one of our biggest events of the year, our Metric Night: Let it Rain. …

item.title: Bringing the rain to those in need
item.author: Matthew Murchie,
item.description: It’s common knowledge that water is essential for survival. Lesser known, perhaps, is the multitude of water-related problems faced by people in areas without adequate water supplies such as Tabora. The few shallow wells, lakes and rivers that provide the local population with water are often …
